member.name: T:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.OAuth2ClientSettings
member.summary: The OAuth client settings.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.OAuth2ClientSettings.ClientId
member.summary: Gets or sets the client identifier.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.OAuth2ClientSettings.ClientSecret
member.summary: Gets or sets the client secret.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.OAuth2ClientSettings.Realm
member.summary: Gets or sets the realm.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.OAuth2ClientSettings.AppName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the application.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.OAuth2ClientSettings.ScopeSeparator
member.summary: Gets or sets the scope separator.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.OAuth2ClientSettings.AdditionalQueryStringParameters
member.summary: Gets or sets the additional query string parameters.

member.name: T:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.SwaggerOwinSettings
member.summary: The settings for UseSwagger.

member.name: M:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.SwaggerOwinSettings.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.SwaggerOwinSettings.MiddlewareBasePath
member.summary: Gets or sets the OWIN base path (when mapped via app.MapOwinPath()) (must start with '/').

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.SwaggerOwinSettings.SwaggerRoute
member.summary: Gets or sets the Swagger URL route (must start with '/').

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.SwaggerOwinSettings.PostProcess
member.summary: Gets or sets the Swagger post process action.

member.name: T:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.SwaggerUiOwinSettings
member.summary: The settings for UseSwaggerUi.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.SwaggerUiOwinSettings.SwaggerUiRoute
member.summary: Gets or sets the swagger UI route (must start with '/').

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.SwaggerUiOwinSettings.ValidateSpecification
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the Swagger specification should be validated.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.SwaggerUiOwinSettings.OAuth2Client
member.summary: Gets or sets the Swagger UI OAuth2 client settings.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.SwaggerUiOwinSettings.SupportedSubmitMethods
member.summary: Gets or sets the Swagger UI supported submit methods. An array of of the HTTP operations that will have the 'Try it out!' option.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.SwaggerUiOwinSettings.DocExpansion
member.summary: Controls how the API listing is displayed. It can be set to 'none' (default), 'list' (shows operations for each resource), or 'full' (fully expanded: shows operations and their details).

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.SwaggerUiOwinSettings.UseJsonEditor
member.summary: Enables a graphical view for editing complex bodies. Defaults to false.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.SwaggerUiOwinSettings.DefaultModelRendering
member.summary: Controls how models are shown when the API is first rendered. (The user can always switch the rendering for a given model by clicking the 'Model' and 'Model Schema' links.) It can be set to 'model' or 'schema', and the default is 'schema'.

member.name: P:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.SwaggerUiOwinSettings.ShowRequestHeaders
member.summary: Whether or not to show the headers that were sent when making a request via the 'Try it out!' option. Defaults to false.

member.name: T:NSwag.AspNet.Owin.SwaggerExtensions
member.summary: Provides OWIN extensions to enable Swagger UI.

member.summary: Addes the Swagger generator and Swagger UI to the OWIN pipeline.
member.param: The Web API assembly to search for controller types.

member.summary: Addes the Swagger generator to the OWIN pipeline.

member.summary: Addes the Swagger generator to the OWIN pipeline.

member.summary: Addes the Swagger generator and Swagger UI to the OWIN pipeline.
